message: Something is dragging me down, like quicksand...
When I open my eyes, I'm standing in a dark room.
Huh? Sliding screens?
The floor is straw mats, too.
The room is almost five meters across and lit by flickering candles set in tall candlesticks.
Amid the smell of burning wax, I catch the faint fragrance of sandalwood.
Is this... Koujaku's mind?
It has to be a memory from the time he spent off the island.
I reach out to open the screen in front of me.

name: 紅雀母
message: "U-Uuh... Ngh, uuh... Uuh..."
...I hear a voice. A woman sobbing.
Is she behind this screen?
Heart pounding, I slowly open the screen.
Stepping through, I find myself in a room just like the one I left.
And then, I feel something tickle my leg.
I look down. Strands of thick black hair are wrapped around my ankle.
To my horror, the hair begins to grow, crawling up my body.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell?!"
I tear free and bolt into the room.
The hair... No, not hair. It looked like hair at first, but now I realize that it resembles Koujaku's tattoo.
I can hear it slithering after me.

name: 紅雀母
message: "U-Uuh... Ngh, uuh... Uuuh..."
Koujaku's voice! His sobs have joined the weeping woman's.
Where is he?!
Another sliding screen. Could Koujaku be on the other side?

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shit!"
